item.description:
If you live in Framingham, Natick, Wayland, Weston, Wellesely, Holliston, Ashland, Hopkinton, Sudbury, Sherborn, etc, this is your Tea Party group!

Join us as we talk politics, how we can effect elections and how we can return honor and integrity to Beacon Hill and Capitol Hill.

Nicolas Sanchez, PhD Economics, will speak about his upcoming book - Destined for Failure: American Prosperity in the Age of Bailouts.

Charlie Baker, candidate for Governor, Gerry Dembrowski, candidate for US Congress, Ed McGrath, candidate for State Senate and Kurt Hayes, candidate for State Rep are all expected as well.
item.name: Framingham/Natick Meet Up
